title: Active Learning for Cell Type Annotation
description: Group course project for 02-750 Automation of Scientific Research. Evaluated four active learning methods for cell type annotation using a challenging PBMC dataset and a two hidden layer MLP as the base learner.

title: Closed Loop Automated Battleship
description: Automation lab project combining a liquid handler, plate reader, and python scripts to play a closed-loop battleship game using the Thermo Fisher Momentum suite (code not provided to preserve the academic challenge).

title: Inferring Horizontal Gene Transfer Events in Phylogeneic Tree Construction
description: Group course project for 02-604 Fundamentals of Bioinformatics focusing on horizontal gene transfer effects on phylogenetic tree topology in bacteria. Detected and interpreted tree topology conflicts in both gene segments (i.e. intragenic conflict) and full gene transfer events.
